title: Developer
summary: Building digital experiences with code and creativity.
bio: I'm a software developer that adapts to the needs of the project, for this reason i'm not specialized in a specific language, although i have more experience in Java and i have OCJP6 certification, also i have projects in other languages.
feelFree: Feel free to reach out to me! I'm open to discussing new projects, creative ideas or opportunities.
subject: Subject
nameSize: The name must be at least 2 characters
messagePlaceHolder: Hello, I wold like to discuss...

projects.descriptionGym: This project focuses on managing all the basic functions of a gym, such as member registration, member check-ins and check-outs, membership payments, etc.
projects.descriptionCar: I created this project during my time in engineering. It was originally made in Delphi (Object Pascal), and I updated it by completely redeveloping it in Java with Forms and MySQL as the database.
projects.descriptionToDo: This is a simple web application I created to train my knowledge in Angular and Java Spring Boot. It's a basic to-do list where I implement the interaction between a CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) and a MySQL database.

education.degreeEngineer: Computer Systems Engineering with a specialization in Robotics.
education.degreeManagment: Computer equipment maintenance and digital control.
